duties_responsibilities.duty: Participating in the design, testing, evaluation, implementation, and support for multiple complex technical solutions.
Managing the lifecycle complexity of the solutions (hardware, operating systems, software, systems tools, and IT processes).
Software migration from Endpoint Configuration Manager (SCCM) to VMware Workspace ONE.
Creating presentations and/or diagrams of the infrastructure, processes, and standards.
Understanding each application function on a maintenance device with the ability to modify the behavior.
